titles.title: Lawful Worker Tax Deduction Act
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify that wages paid to unauthorized aliens may not be deducted from gross income, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 7/23/2007--Introduced. Lawful Worker Tax Deduction Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to deny a tax deduction for wages paid to or on behalf of an unauthorized alien (defined as an alien not lawfully admitted for permanent residence or authorized to work).
